org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath
Class AeAbstractXPathExpressionRunner

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.AeAbstractExpressionRunner

All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeExpressionRunner
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBPWSXPathExpressionRunner, AeWSBPELXPathExpressionRunner
public abstract class AeAbstractXPathExpressionRunner
extends AeAbstractExpressionRunner

A base class for implementations of xpath expression runners.

Method Detail

doExecuteExpression

protected java.lang.Object doExecuteExpression(java.lang.String aExpression,
                                               IAeExpressionRunnerContext aContext)
                                        throws AeBpelException
Description copied from class: AeAbstractExpressionRunner
This method is called to do the actual execution of the expression. The return value is whatever is returned from the 3rd party library being use for a specific language (saxon, rhino, etc).

Specified by:
doExecuteExpression in class AeAbstractExpressionRunner

doExecuteJoinConditionExpression

protected java.lang.Object doExecuteJoinConditionExpression(java.lang.String aExpression,
                                                            IAeExpressionRunnerContext aContext)
                                                     throws AeBpelException
Description copied from class: AeAbstractExpressionRunner
This method is called to do the actual execution of a join condition expression. The return value is whatever is returned from the 3rd party library being use for a specific language (saxon, rhino, etc). This implementation simply calls the abstract doExecuteExpression method, but subclasses may need to override it.

Overrides:
doExecuteJoinConditionExpression in class AeAbstractExpressionRunner
Parameters:
aExpression -
aContext -
Throws:
AeBpelException
See Also:
AeAbstractExpressionRunner.doExecuteJoinConditionExpression(java.lang.String, org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.IAeExpressionRunnerContext)
